name: EmployeeLoginLinkController

methods.name: getEmployeeLoginUrl
methods.description: Returns the path to the page that employees see after they log in.

params.name: startUrl
params.description: Path to the page that employees see after they log in.

methods.name: getIsAllowInternalUserLoginEnabled
methods.description: Indicates whether an internal user is allowed to log in to the community.

description: Represents the link on the login form that employees can click to log in. For internal use only.
